The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 September is 299,647 (532.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 September, there were 9,483 new confirmed cases (16.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 August, there were 6,877 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 38% (2606 extra cases).
